subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Thierry Henry scored two first-half goals and Joel Lindpere and Juan Agudelo added second-half goals as the Red Bulls defeated host D.C. United, 4-0, on Thursday night.
snippet: Thierry Henry scored two first-half goals and Joel Lindpere and Juan Agudelo added second-half goals as the Red Bulls defeated host D.C. United, 4-0, on Thursday night.
